content.rendered:
EN MASSE – MINIMALIST DESIGN

Our en masse collection features a minimalist design approach, highlighting a single flower bouquet variety for maximum impact. There is no additional foliage or distractions, reflecting refined taste and a sophisticated aesthetic.

Please place your trust in us, to choose the finest flowers to convey your sentiments.

Peonies

$105.00 – $160.00 incl GST

Did somebody say PEONIES?!  Our peonies are locally grown, meaning they are picked fresh and delivered straight from the farm. Arranged in a vase, their luxurious and full flower heads convey effortless charm and understated elegance. Symbolising prosperity, good fortune and a happy marriage! Simply presented en masse, with no additional foliage added. Finished in...

Pink Roses

$205.00 incl GST

Our Ecuadorian pink roses exude romance and classic elegance. Each rose petal is carefully reflexed to create an exquisite full appearance. When arranged in a vase, their impressive and timeless elegance demands attention. Simply presented en masse, with no additional foliage added. Finished in our signature wrap and trailing ribbon OR with the option to...

Phalaenopsis Orchid

$85.00 – $290.00 incl GST

A timeless classic! Our phalaenopsis orchid stems make the perfect gift of luxury, effortlessly bringing a sense of tranquility and sophistication to any living space. Long lasting when conditioned regularly and symbolic of pure love, beauty, and elegance. Simply presented en masse, with no additional foliage added. Finished in our signature wrap and trailing ribbon...

Cymbidium Orchid

$85.00 – $280.00 incl GST

Thriving in New Zealand’s optimal climate, our cymbidium orchid stems produce exceptionally large florals. Their presence effortlessly infuses any space with refined beauty. Impressive, bold, a true statement piece! Simply presented en masse, with no additional foliage added. Finished in our signature wrap and trailing ribbon OR with the option to add a contemporary ‘Marmoset...

MINIMALIST FLOWER ARRANGEMENTS

Discover the essence of modern simplicity with our minimalist flower arrangements. Each single flower bouquet features a single flower type, creating a simple flower arrangement that radiates elegance.

With over a decade of industry expertise, our owner and lead floral designer, Rachael, personally hand-selects every stem to ensure the freshest and highest quality blooms for our single flower bouquet. With over 11 years of industry experience, we work closely with Queensland flower wholesalers and micro growers throughout the Gold Coast Hinterland and the Northern NSW region to source the freshest and highest quality flowers

At LULLY & ROSE, we celebrate nature’s diversity, ensuring each minimalist floral arrangement is as unique as its recipient. Enjoy same-day delivery across the Gold Coast, handled with care by our specialized couriers.

Explore our range of en masse flowers, hampers, and indoor plants, designed to create heartfelt moments and lasting memories. For a stunning example of our minimalist floral arrangements, check out our Peonies En Masse Bouquet, Pink Roses En Masse, Phalaenopsis Orchid Stems, and Cymbidium Orchid Stems. Visit our website to place your order today!
